Classes/SBAScheduleManager.html.abstract: Default data source handler for scheduled activities. This manager is used to get SBBScheduledActivity

Classes/SBAScheduledActivityArchive.html.name: SBAScheduledActivityArchive
Classes/SBAScheduledActivityArchive.html.abstract: A subclass of the SBBDataArchive that implements RSDDataArchive for task results.

Classes/SBASurveyConfiguration.html.name: SBASurveyConfiguration
Classes/SBASurveyConfiguration.html.abstract: SBASurveyConfiguration is a survey wrapper that can extend the default implementation

Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
